reviews.review: Ну норм
十多年前的游戏现在看来依旧十分优秀，片尾曲就听了好几年，上一次玩还是在2015年，今天居然为了做个徽章任务通关了。纪念一下。

[quote=Wasterbull] AAA Game [/quote]

[i]"The cake is a lie!!"[/i]

[h1] PLOT [/h1]
[h1][code][i]You're a girl called Chell and part of the Aperture Science Laboratories experiment, testing the device that allows you to make portals and make your life easier, you must pass tests using your ability to solve puzzles. GlaDOS is your guide and evaluator.
[/i][/code][/h1]

  
[h1]	 GAMEPLAY [/h1]
To be honest, the game has been very well and feels fresh and I enjoyed it a lot, without any uncomfortable moment when I was playing with the keyboard and mouse.

I think it's really interesting and innovative videogame, they're good puzzles but also is a short game, at least is enjoyable, good challenge.

[h1]	 GRAPHIC [/h1]
Of course, perfectly optimized. Good level design despite being simple, what matters is the gameplay that the graphic aspect. And to emphasize that it is very visually, it feels fresh.

[h1]	 MUSIC [/h1]
I love a lot the song Still Alive, great OST. Ellen McLain did a masterful job with her interpretation as GlaDOS.

[h1]	 MY OPINION ABOUT THE GAME [/h1]
Obviously, Valve made a great effort to make an interesting and funny plot, which is a great advantage. If Portal didn't have a plot and a character, it would have been a simple game but with a character so charismatic and at the same time fun. It's really great.

Great OST, hilarious dialogues, good puzzles that will make your brain work, very fun and totally is a great experience.

I'm GlaD to have played although late, the game is just beautiful.

[h1]	 NOTE: 10/10 [/h1]


[h1]	 PRO + [/h1]
[list]
    [*] Satisfactory [/list]
    [*] An interesting way to play [/list]
    [*] GlaDOS, one of the best characters that ever existed [/list]
    [*] 15 Achievements for those who like to add more games completed at 100%[/list]

[h1]	 CONTRA - [/h1]
[list]
    [*]Nothing bad to say, it's a great game[/list]

[code]If you came here reading my review; dude c'mon! Buy it and you will enjoy it!

Portal; undoubtedly it's one of the best videogames in the history, it is one of the games you must play before dying.
[/code]
Very Fun Throwback! Good Puzzles (much shorter than I remember)
義務教育です

어렸을 때 해적판으로 해보고 성인이 되어 스팀을 통해 정품으로 구매하였다가
이번 19년 봄맞이 청소에 추천게임으로 떠서 다시 플레이 해보았다.
플레이시간은 한시간 조금 더 걸린거 같다. 

게임 난이도 설계도 잘되있고 스토리도 나쁘지 않은 명작이다.
무엇보다 이 게임을 처음 접했을 떄 신선한 게임 시스템은 정말 잊혀지지 않는다.
오랜 시간이 지나도 빛을 잃지 않는 수작이며, 아직 안해본 사람이 있다면 한번 쯤은 꼭 해봐야 하는 갓겜이라 생각한다.

특히 포탈 1, 2 번들로 자주 큰 할인을 하기 때문에 할인 찬스 오면 바로다가 구매하는 것을 추천한다.
Juego totalmente orientado a la lógica. Ofrece puzzles de cierta complejidad incremental muy satisfactorios al completarlos. Muy recomendado.

Portal is a MASTERPIECE, simple as that. It's filled with fun and clever puzzles which compliment the game's flawless physics engine, unique game mechanics and it's extremely well designed. I ABSOLUTELY recommend you giving this game a shot. It's beginner-friendly, it's great fun, and even though the main story might be considered short, I think it's length is perfect for what it is.
Really fun and a classic. 10/10

Portal est l'un des plus beaux et des meilleurs jeux auxquels il m'est été donné de jouer.
Valve nous livre encore un bijou.
Je n'ai pas grand chose à dire sur ce jeu, il est juste parfait en terme de jouabilité, de fluidité, de gameplay, d'histoire.
Si vous faites partie des joueurs qui ne l'ont pas testé, alors foncez vous ne serez pas déçu (à la condition d'aller jusqu'au bout ;)).
Les graphismes, malgré l'âge du jeu, sont encore plus qu'acceptable et ne vous perturberons pas bien au contraire.
Bonne game à vous !

Portal — компьютерная игра в жанре головоломки от первого лица , разработанная Valve Corporation в 2007 году и по сей день останется отличной головоломкой .
Геймплей состоит из разнообразных задач, нам придётся, думать, скакать, думать, прыгать, думать, уворачиваться, думать и еще раз думать. Чтобы пройти особенно сложные комнаты с головоломками, нам надо помнить универсальное правило порталов: "Что быстро влетит, то быстро вылетит". Отсюда следует, что при пересечения портала на вас будут действовать различные законы физики как например инерция, сила тяжести . Так что чтобы пройти надо будет думать как правильно, под каким углом и с какой скоростью лучше запрыгнуть в него, а так думать напрягает по статистике 99% людей, в этом и фишка игры, что она в некоторых местах сложная, и реально заставляет задуматься человека о смысле бытия всего мира. В общем, отличная игра сыграйте, не пожалеете.

+ Великолепный сюжет, напитанный загадками и философией, зрелищные окружения в ходе прохождения игры, невероятные музыкальные композиции.
- Вообще нету

Innovatives Puzzle Spiel mit einem gut geschriebenen Antagonisten. Die Physik Rätsel werden gegen Ende etwas fordernder sind aber immer nachvollziehbar und motivieren in den knapp 4 Stunden Spielzeit. Die Präsentation mag etwas dröge sein passt aber durchaus zur Atmosphäre des Spiels.   

9/10 (Genre: Puzzle Spiel)
